name: Lancer Assault
description:
Lancer Assault is my 2D Shooter study project.

I made the following modifications to the project template:

  • Player sprite re-skin
  • 3 enemy sprite re-skins
  • Spawner sprite creation
  • 3 level backgrounds artwork
  • 2 level "wall" artwork
  • 3 unique level layouts
  • Game logo creation
  • 4 UI screens redesign with button creation (main menu, level select, Instructions and pause screen)

Created By KCA
